Food is loaded into your cars by our volunteers.  Note: June 5, 2025 distribution will be held at Otero County Fairgrounds, 401 Fairgrounds Road, Alamogordo NM.  Note: July 31, 2025 distribution (change in date) will be held at Otero County Fairgrounds, 401 Fairgrounds Road, Alamogordo NM.  Note: There will be no distribution in the month of August.
